properties.body:
NORTH ATLANTIC.
SENEGAL TO CARIBBEAN.
S/V MITHRANDIR, 29 PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT
DUE TO ENGINE FAILURE. SEVEN CREWMAN REQUIRING MEDICAL
ASSISTANCE VICINITY 09-00N 030-00W. VESSELS IN VICINITY
ABLE TO PROVIDE MEDICAL ASSISTANCE REQUESTED TO ASSIST
IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC DAKAR, PHONE: 2213 3826 5001,
2217 7740 6313, FAX: 2213 3826 5000,
E-MAIL: MARINENAT@ORANGE.SN.
